titles.title: A bill to provide for a report on the maintenance of Federal land holdings under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior.
A bill to provide for a report on the maintenance of Federal land holdings under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
This bill requires the Department of the Interior, after the submission of the President's budget for FY2020, to report to Congress on
all federal land holdings under Interior's jurisdiction; and the total costs of maintaining such holdings for FY2017-FY2019, including an accounting of the holdings of, and expenditures made by, each federal agency.
